title: YouTube Hunter 5.5.8 – Download and convert YouTube videos

YouTubeHunter downloads videos 15x faster than real time playing and supports simultaneous downloads. YouTubeHunter has built-in search and preview capabilities. title: TranslateQ 2.0.6 – Online translator

title: Jaksta 1.4.2 – Record and download streaming audio and video
content: Jaksta is the easiest way to download and convert Video, Audio and MP3s from the Web to your Mac. title: Haven 1.1 – A writing tool, and a place to write

title: Bee 2.1 – Client for tracking in FogBugz, GitHub, and JIRA
content: Bee syncs with GitHub Issues, JIRA, and FogBugz. You can also use Bee to keep track of your plain text notes.   Features: Flight Path. title: Atlas for Google Maps 1.0 – Information, directions and street-level on Google Maps

title: Thumbtack 2.1 – Easy access to your Pinboard bookmarks
